Articles.Content:
I think I orbited the sun...

[http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/17/screenshot1cuo.png/](http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/17/screenshot1cuo.png/) ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)
Yup. Looks like you escaped Kerbin orbit!

I kinda did the same thing but worse. Now i dont know how to get them back :-[

![screenshot12.png](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/11003858/KSP/screenshot12.png)
I have 5 ships out there unable to get back.

> 
> I have 5 ships out there unable to get back.

Hopefully we will be able to save them one day =)

I\'ve been orbiting the sun for 6000 days with half a tank of fuel.

I will get home. I will get home. I will get home.
